snippet: Michael R. Tilus had been officially reprimanded for warning federal officials about widespread child abuse on the Spirit Lake Indian Reservation in North Dakota.
abstract: Health and Human Services Department says government psychologist Michael R Tilus, who was officially reprimanded for warning federal officials about widespread child abuse on the Spirit Lake Indian Reservation in North Dakota, has had his punishment rescinded.
lead_paragraph: Michael R. Tilus had been officially reprimanded for warning federal officials about widespread child abuse on the Spirit Lake Indian Reservation in North Dakota.

headline.main: Official Rescinds Punishment of Psychologist on Reservation
headline.print_headline: Official Rescinds Punishment Of Psychologist on Reservation
